item.title: 特朗普关税有可能加深 6.3 万亿美元的印中股票缺口
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统对印度的关税升级使印度股市面临进一步落后于中国的风险，而印度一直试图取代中国，成为世界经济增长的下一个主要引擎。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff escalation with India is putting its stock market at risk of falling further behind China — the very country India has been trying to supplant as the world’s next major engine of growth.】

item.title: 比利亚维森西奥将被正式任命为哥伦比亚外交部长
item.description: 罗莎-比利亚维森西奥（Rosa Villavicencio）将被任命为哥伦比亚外交部长，因为这个安第斯国家正面临着与美国和邻国秘鲁关系紧张的问题。【原文：Rosa Villavicencio is set to be confirmed as Colombia’s foreign minister as the Andean nation faces fraying relations with the US and neighboring Peru.】

item.title: 美国通胀率将因关税提高而上升
item.description: 由于零售商逐步提高了进口关税较高的各种商品的价格，7 月份美国消费者的基本通胀率可能略有回升。【原文：US consumers probably experienced a slight pickup in underlying inflation in July as retailers gradually raised prices on a variety of items subject to higher import duties.】

item.title: 墨西哥确定番茄出口价格以缓和与特朗普的贸易摩擦
item.description: 在特朗普政府征收反倾销税后，墨西哥为出口到美国的新鲜番茄设定了最低价格，寻求重新获得全面的市场准入。【原文：Mexico set minimum prices for fresh tomato exports to the US, seeking to regain full access to the market after the Trump administration imposed an anti-dumping duty.】

item.title: 一切都很昂贵。无处藏身信贷周刊
item.description: 至少在一代人的时间里，信贷市场上的讨价还价者最难找到优惠。【原文：Credit market bargain shoppers are having the hardest time finding deals in at least a generation.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼呼吁社区银行改革，赞成降息
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周六发布了两条重要消息，她宣布将于 10 月 9 日主办社区银行会议，并赞成今年降息三次。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman delivered two key pieces of news on Saturday, announcing she will host an Oct. 9 community bank conference and favors three interest-rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 华尔街对移民是否是美国招聘放缓的幕后推手意见不一
item.description: 华尔街经济学家对美国就业增长急剧放缓背后的原因意见不一，这凸显了一个对更广泛的经济前景至关重要的分歧。【原文：Wall Street economists disagree on what’s behind a sharp slowdown in US job growth, highlighting a divide that is central to the broader outlook for the economy.】

item.title: 以金条为基础的全球市场因关税威胁而颤抖
item.description: 全球黄金市场依赖于一个由银行、精炼厂和快递公司组成的网络，这些公司可以在接到通知的一瞬间在主要交易中心之间空运金块，以追求最高价格。上周五，美国的一项令人震惊的裁决表明，黄金将被征收关税，这使该系统陷入混乱。【原文：The global gold market relies on a network of banks, refineries and couriers that can fly bullion between key trading hubs at a moment’s notice in pursuit of the highest prices. On Friday, a shock US ruling suggesting that the metal would be subject to tariffs plunged that system into chaos.】

item.title: 交易员纷纷逃离恐受人工智能威胁的股票
item.description: 人工智能对美国金融市场的影响是显而易见的。英伟达公司是全球最有价值的公司，价值近4.5万亿美元。从OpenAI到Anthropic等初创公司已融资数百亿美元。【原文：Artificial intelligence’s imprint on US financial markets is unmistakable. Nvidia Corp. is the most valuable company in the world at nearly $4.5 trillion. Startups from OpenAI to Anthropic have raised tens of billions of dollars.】

item.title: 天空电视台称索瑞尔的 S4 Capital 收到并购邀请
item.description: 据天空新闻（Sky News）周六报道，英国商人马丁-索瑞尔（Martin Sorrell）创办的传媒集团 S4 Capital Plc 最近几周收到了一些收购者关于潜在合作的邀请。【原文：S4 Capital Plc, the media group founded by British businessman Martin Sorrell, has received approaches from suitors in recent weeks over a potential tie-up, Sky News reported Saturday.】

item.title: 生成式人工智能与关税的得与失
item.description:

item.title: 特朗普的高加索赌局将开辟新的东西方贸易走廊
item.description: 在南高加索的一片山地上，有一条潜在的重要贸易路线，这条路线横跨一系列地缘政治热点，几个世纪以来引发了无数冲突，近年来更是如此。【原文：Along a mountainous stretch of the South Caucasus lies a potentially important trade route—one that straddles a series of geopolitical flashpoints that have set off countless conflicts over the centuries, right up into recent years.】

item.title: 第四艘受限天然气船出现在受制裁的北极液化天然气工厂附近
item.description: 第四艘受制裁的液化天然气油轮已抵达俄罗斯北极出口工厂附近，该工厂也受到美国的限制，莫斯科正试图扩大这种燃料的运输量。【原文：A fourth sanctioned liquefied natural gas tanker has arrived near Russia’s Arctic export plant, also subject to the US restrictions, as Moscow attempts to expand shipments of the fuel.】

item.title: 绘制全球经济图表：分裂的英格兰银行降息
item.description: 英国央行将利率下调至两年多来的最低点，这一决定比预期的更为接近，这给投资者留下了行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）所说的下一步行动的 "真正不确定性"。【原文：The Bank of England reduced interest rates to a more than two-year low in a closer-than-expected decision that leaves investors with what Governor Andrew Bailey called “genuine uncertainty” on its next move.】

item.title: 瑞士关税大戏如何从希望走向绝望
item.description: 7 月 4 日，在美国庆祝独立日之际，瑞士的高层部长们也有理由欢欣鼓舞。他们达成了一项协议，避免了唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的惩罚性关税。【原文：On July 4, as the US celebrated Independence Day, Switzerland’s top circle of ministers also had reason to rejoice. They’d secured a deal to avoid punitive tariffs from Donald Trump — or so they thought.】

item.title: Unitree 首席执行官称仿人机器人仍缺乏人工智能技术
item.description: 中国一家著名机器人开发商的创始人表示，人工智能技术使仿人机器人成为主流仍是该行业面临的主要挑战。【原文：Artificial intelligence technology to get humanoid robots into the mainstream remains a key challenge for the sector, according to the founder of one of China’s prominent robot developers.】

item.title: 德国曾拥有世界上最好的职业体系。发生了什么？
item.description: 早上 7 点，除了磨床的轰鸣声，多布里科夫的主要街道一片寂静。在村里木匠铺的院子里，一个 17 岁的孩子把一扇老式门拖到工作台上，准备重新上漆和清漆。【原文：The main street of Dobbrikow is silent at 7am, save for the roar of a grinding machine. In the courtyard of the village’s carpentry, a 17-year-old lugs a vintage door to the workbench, preparing for it to be repainted and varnished.】

item.title: 英格兰银行在通货膨胀问题上罕见地出现如此大的分歧
item.description: 本周英格兰银行的降息可能是安德鲁-贝利担任行长以来分歧最大的一次。【原文：This week’s interest-rate cut at the Bank of England was perhaps the most divisive yet under Andrew Bailey’s governorship.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片公司 DeepX 在上市前聘请摩根士丹利提供资金
item.description: 韩国人工智能芯片设计公司 DeepX Co. 已聘请摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）协助其在 2027 年首次公开募股前进行一轮融资。【原文：South Korean AI chip designer DeepX Co. has hired Morgan Stanley to assist with a round of capital-raising ahead of a potential initial public offering in 2027.】

item.title: 中国消费通胀在反价格战运动中保持不变
item.description: 由于政府承诺遏制过度竞争，通货紧缩压力有所缓解，7 月份中国居民消费价格保持稳定。【原文：China’s consumer prices held steady in July as deflationary pressures eased on the back of a government pledge to contain excessive competition.】

item.title: Codelco 重启智利铜矿获部分批准
item.description: 在一起致命事故导致停工一周后，Codelco 公司获得了智利矿业当局的批准，恢复其最大铜矿的部分地下活动。劳工监管机构仍需签署该计划。【原文：Codelco secured the approval of Chile’s mining authority to resume some underground activities at its biggest copper mine, a week after a fatal accident led to work being halted. Labor regulators still need to sign off on the plan.】

item.title: C3.ai 公布销售额远低于预期，管理层发生动荡
item.description: C3.ai Inc. 公布的第一季度初步营收远低于分析师预期，该公司还重组了销售管理团队。该公司股价在延时交易中下跌了约 10%。【原文：C3.ai Inc. released preliminary first-quarter revenue that fell far short of analysts’ estimates and restructured its sales management team. The shares fell about 10% in extended trading.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚通胀意外加速 石油币遭遇挫折
item.description: 哥伦比亚上个月的通货膨胀率有所上升，这可能会使古斯塔沃-彼得罗总统推动降息以促进南美国家经济发展的努力变得更加复杂。【原文：Colombia’s inflation rate ticked up last month potentially complicating President Gustavo Petro’s push for an interest rate cut that could boost the South American country’s economy.】

item.title: 前 OpenAI、DeepMind 员工在 Andreessen 领投的融资中估值 10 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，风险投资公司 Andreessen Horowitz 已同意牵头向 Periodic Labs 投资 2 亿美元。【原文：Venture firm Andreessen Horowitz has agreed to lead a $200 million investment in Periodic Labs, a new startup building artificial intelligence for material science, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 与特朗普有关联的 World Liberty 拟推出价值 15 亿美元的加密货币工具
item.description: 特朗普家族支持的世界自由金融公司（World Liberty Financial）计划成立一家上市公司，持有其 WLFI 代币，加入数字资产财务公司的热潮。【原文：Big investors are being sounded out on a plan for World Liberty Financial, the Trump family-backed venture, to set up a public company that would hold its WLFI tokens, joining the boom in digital-asset treasury firms.】

item.title: 稳定币的增长受到外汇成本的困扰
item.description: 即使在稳定币进入预期高峰期的时候，更广泛的金融科技圈内的资深人士也看到了代币作为新兴支付工具的局限性。【原文：Even as stablecoins enter a period of peak expectations, veterans in wider fintech circles see limitations to the tokens as an emerging payments tool.】

item.title: 联合现场服务公司与贷款人重新聘请顾问进行债务谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，白金股权公司（Platinum Equity）支持的便携式厕所公司 United Site Services 正在与顾问合作，因为该公司的业绩仍在挣扎。【原文：Platinum Equity-backed portable toilet company United Site Services is working with advisers as its performance continues to struggle, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: OpenAI 的 GPT-5 首日褒贬不一，令人困惑
item.description: 几个月来，OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）一直在大肆宣传 GPT-5 的功能，并将其作为公司的开创性时刻。但在发布后的 24 小时内，这款新机型却受到了褒贬不一的评价。【原文：For months, OpenAI Chief Executive Officer Sam Altman has been hyping up the capabilities of GPT-5, setting up the launch as a seminal moment for the company. But in the first 24 hours after its release, the new model was met with mixed reviews.】

item.title: 痴迷于风险的华尔街交易员再次淡忘宏观忧虑
item.description: 一周前，自大流行病以来最糟糕的就业数据让固定收益投资者竞相猜测经济将大幅放缓。在股票和信贷市场，你已经很难注意到这份报告曾经发生过。【原文：A week ago, the worst jobs data since the pandemic sent fixed-income investors racing to price in a sharp economic slowdown. Already in equity and credit markets, you’d have a hard time noticing the report ever happened.】

item.title: PetSmart 出售 47 亿美元债务，增加投资者保护措施
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）和摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Citigroup Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. priced $4.7 billion of junk-rated debt for PetSmart LLC to refinance lower-yielding borrowings after investor-friendly protections were added to the deals.】
